statements: UPDATE messages SET message_content = 'Updated message content' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE messages SET is_encrypted = true, sender_id = 100, receiver_id = 200 WHERE message_id = 2;
UPDATE messages SET message_content = 'Updated Message Content' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE messages SET sender_id = 2, receiver_id = 3, is_encrypted = true WHERE message_id = 2;
UPDATE healthcare_providers SET specialty = 'Cardiology' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE patients SET medical_history = 'Allergies: Peanuts, Asthma' WHERE id = 4
UPDATE healthcare_providers SET specialty = 'Neurology', email = 'neurology@clinic.com' WHERE id = 105;
UPDATE patients SET medical_history = 'Heart condition, prescribed medication: Xanax', phone_number = '555-789-1234' WHERE id = 207;
UPDATE PatientMessages SET message_text='Reminder: Please take your medication' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE FileShares SET file_name='PatientReport.pdf', share_date='2022-01-20 09:30:00' WHERE share_id = 5;
UPDATE PatientMessages SET message_text = 'New message text', message_date = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE FileShares SET file_name = 'New File Name', file_url = 'https://example.com/newfile.pdf', share_date = '2022-09-16 08:45:00' WHERE share_id = 3;
UPDATE Providers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Patients SET encrypted_password = 'new_password123' WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE Providers SET provider_name = 'New Provider Name', email = 'new.provider@example.com' WHERE provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Messages SET message_text = 'Updated Message Text' WHERE message_id = 10;
UPDATE Healthcare_Providers SET provider_email = 'updated_email@example.com' WHERE provider_id = 1;
UPDATE Messages SET message_text = 'New message content' WHERE receiver_id = 2 AND sender_id = 1;
UPDATE Healthcare_Providers SET provider_email = 'newemail@example.com', provider_phone = '+1234567890' WHERE provider_id = 1;
UPDATE Patients SET patient_name = 'John Doe', patient_phone = '+9876543210' WHERE patient_id = 2;
